session_summary: On May 25, 2023 at 1:14 pm, Melanie tells Caroline about her recent experience running a charity race for mental health. Caroline expresses pride and agrees that taking care of oneself is important. Melanie shares her struggle with self-care but mentions that she is carving out time each day for activities that refresh her. Caroline encourages Melanie and praises her efforts. Melanie then asks Caroline about her plans for the summer, to which Caroline replies that she is researching adoption agencies as she wants to give a loving home to children in need. Melanie praises Caroline's decision and expresses excitement for her future family. Caroline explains that she chose an adoption agency that supports the LGBTQ+ community because of its inclusivity and support. Melanie commends Caroline's choice and asks what she is looking forward to in the adoption process. Caroline says she is thrilled to create a family for kids who need one, despite the challenges of being a single parent. Melanie encourages Caroline and expresses confidence in her ability to provide a safe and loving home. The conversation ends with Melanie expressing her excitement for Caroline's new chapter.

conversation_turns.speaker: Melanie
conversation_turns.text: Hey Caroline, since we last chatted, I've had a lot of things happening to me. I ran a charity race for mental health last Saturday – it was really rewarding. Really made me think about taking care of our minds.

conversation_turns.speaker: Caroline
conversation_turns.text: That charity race sounds great, Mel! Making a difference & raising awareness for mental health is super rewarding - I'm really proud of you for taking part!

conversation_turns.speaker: Melanie
conversation_turns.text: Thanks, Caroline! The event was really thought-provoking. I'm starting to realize that self-care is really important. It's a journey for me, but when I look after myself, I'm able to better look after my family.

conversation_turns.speaker: Caroline
conversation_turns.text: I totally agree, Melanie. Taking care of ourselves is so important - even if it's not always easy. Great that you're prioritizing self-care.

conversation_turns.speaker: Melanie
conversation_turns.text: Yeah, it's tough. So I'm carving out some me-time each day - running, reading, or playing my violin - which refreshes me and helps me stay present for my fam!

conversation_turns.speaker: Caroline
conversation_turns.text: That's great, Mel! Taking time for yourself is so important. You're doing an awesome job looking after yourself and your family!

conversation_turns.speaker: Melanie
conversation_turns.text: Thanks, Caroline. It's still a work in progress, but I'm doing my best. My kids are so excited about summer break! We're thinking about going camping next month. Any fun plans for the summer?

conversation_turns.speaker: Caroline
conversation_turns.text: Researching adoption agencies — it's been a dream to have a family and give a loving home to kids who need it.

conversation_turns.speaker: Melanie
conversation_turns.text: Wow, Caroline! That's awesome! Taking in kids in need - you're so kind. Your future family is gonna be so lucky to have you!

conversation_turns.speaker: Caroline
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photography of a sign for a new arrival and an information and domestic building
conversation_turns.text: Thanks, Mel! My goal is to give kids a loving home. I'm truly grateful for all the support I've got from friends and mentors. Now the hard work starts to turn my dream into a reality. And here's one of the adoption agencies I'm looking into. It's a lot to take in, but I'm feeling hopeful and optimistic.

conversation_turns.speaker: Melanie
conversation_turns.text: Wow, that agency looks great! What made you pick it?

conversation_turns.speaker: Caroline
conversation_turns.text: I chose them 'cause they help LGBTQ+ folks with adoption. Their inclusivity and support really spoke to me.

conversation_turns.speaker: Melanie
conversation_turns.text: That's great, Caroline! Loving the inclusivity and support. Anything you're excited for in the adoption process?

conversation_turns.speaker: Caroline
conversation_turns.text: I'm thrilled to make a family for kids who need one. It'll be tough as a single parent, but I'm up for the challenge!

conversation_turns.speaker: Melanie
conversation_turns.text: You're doing something amazing! Creating a family for those kids is so lovely. You'll be an awesome mom! Good luck!

conversation_turns.speaker: Caroline
conversation_turns.text: Thanks, Melanie! Your kind words really mean a lot. I'll do my best to make sure these kids have a safe and loving home.

conversation_turns.speaker: Melanie
conversation_turns.text: No doubts, Caroline. You have such a caring heart - they'll get all the love and stability they need! Excited for this new chapter!

Caroline: Caroline is inspired by her supportive friends and mentors to start researching adoption agencies.

Melanie: Melanie ran a charity race for mental health last Saturday.
Melanie is realizing the importance of self-care and its impact on her family.
Melanie carves out me-time each day for activities like running, reading, or playing the violin.
Melanie's kids are excited about summer break and they are considering going camping next month.
Caroline: Caroline is researching adoption agencies with the dream of having a family and providing a loving home to kids in need.
Caroline chose an adoption agency that helps LGBTQ+ folks with adoption due to their inclusivity and support.
Caroline is excited to create a family for kids who need one, even though she anticipates challenges as a single parent.
